name: Franklin's Choice: A ShitPost Status Original
name_original: Franklin's Choice: A ShitPost Status Original
description:
Franklin has  to make his hardest life choice, if he picks the wrong choice he may lose a dear friend of his.

This Game Is A Part Of  The Ambush Original : Shit Post Status Series

Based Off The GTA V Meme : Yee Yee Ass Haircut

Characters:

Franklin and Lamar from GTA V Yee Yee Ass Haircut

All Characters Are Owned By Rockstar Games.
